design_system.name: Tactical Command
design_system.description: A high-density, professional interface designed for bulk messaging efficiency. Prioritizes data visibility, clear status indicators, and a 'mission control' aesthetic.

buttons.primary: bg-emerald-600 text-white hover:bg-emerald-700 shadow-sm rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-zinc-900 border border-zinc-200 hover:bg-zinc-50 shadow-sm rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-zinc-100 text-zinc-600 hover:text-zinc-900 rounded-md px-4 py-2 transition-colors

inputs.base: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for all headings to give a modern, geometric feel.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all data points (message counts, IDs, timestamps) to reinforce the 'tactical' aesthetic.
Implement a 'High Density' mode for the contact list table: reduce padding, use smaller fonts (text-sm), and ensure maximum data visibility.
For the Dashboard, use a 'Bento Grid' layout: mix large summary cards with smaller status indicators.
Use the 'Tactical Emerald' (#059669) sparingly for primary actions (Send, Save) and success states. Do not overuse it.
Ensure all interactive elements have a `data-testid` attribute for testing.
For the 'Message Composer', ensure the text area is large and distraction-free, with a clear character count indicator.
Implement a 'Dark Mode' toggle in the settings or sidebar.
Use the provided 'abstract network' images for the login/signup page backgrounds to create a tech-forward vibe.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic 'Inter' for headings.
Avoid full-screen gradients; use subtle textures or solid colors.
Ensure high contrast for text readability (WCAG AA).
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs for 'breathing room' in the marketing sections, but keep the app dashboard dense.
Add micro-interactions to all buttons and inputs (hover, focus, active states).
